The scientific community, once again, stands amazed at Scrambleâ€™s infallible grasp of the arts of science.

In a statement to his team, Scramble said,

I am glad to provide certainty in my prediction after a very uncertain year. I have no ability to change weather, but I am always glad to inform my fellow New Englanders of the coming weather. I am glad to help in a small way in this cause, and I encourage everyone to do the same.

entry.title: Scramble forecasts Six More Weeks of Winter
entry.content:
Today, at 7:30 a.m., Scramble the Duck predicted six more weeks of winter.

After the opening speech was read, the doors of the model Ivy Glenn were opened, and Scramble waddled down the red carpet.

Photo by Adam Minor

Immediately after, Scramble looked for his shadow, and then told his handlers which scroll to read. The prediction announcement told that Scramble had seen a shadow, forecasting six more weeks of winter. Scramble has made seven predictions, and has a perfect record of accuracy.

Photo by Paul Torcellini

entry.title: Scramble to be on WILI AM
entry.content:
